alert.note: Alert for Phelps (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 22 at 8:13PM CDT until March 28 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Missouri... Roubidoux Creek Near Waynesville affecting Pulaski County. Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. Gasconade River at Hazelgreen affecting Pulaski and Laclede Counties. ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Gasconade River at Jerome. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, moderate flood stage. Flood waters inundate the lower backyard area of residences near the gage site. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 3.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
